name: Jumpgeon
description:
Jumpgeon is a game where you have to escape the dungeon in 20 seconds without dying.  Jump on pillars and ledges to avoid damaging your character from the spikes before reaching the exit!

Also, this is my first game and first game jam so hopefully there won't be much bugs ._. Any feedbacks would be greatly appreciated!  

Fun fact: one of my testers got a high score of 1050!

Enjoy!

Instructions

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look Right/Left

Spacebar - Jump 

2x Spacebar - Double Jump

Esc - Pause Game (adjust mouse sensitivity here)

Notes

Current version of the game is unable to save high score after quit game.

Character might not 'Double Jump' after certain duration in the air. 

Credits for Assets 3D Assets

  • Dungeon structure (Wall, Floor, Spikes, Ledges) by DevilsWork.shop.
  • Torch model and textures by petomavar.

  • Button and Timer Countdown by Ellr.

Textures
